short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a random museum every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with the "Everyday Museum" Chrome extension. Explore the world's most famous museums right from your browser, with a new museum featured each day. Dive into the rich histories, iconic artworks, and unique stories that each museum has to offer, all with a simple click.
